remarks: The span of a set of vectors (in a left module).  ( ~ spanval analog.) (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lspval.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lspval.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lspval.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lspval $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ U C_ V ) -> ( N ` U ) = |^| { t e. S | U C_ t } ) $.
$d S t $.
$d U t $.
$d V t $.
